name: linea-attestation-registry-subgraph
description: Subgraph to index the main objects of Verax
author: Consensys

scripts.build:arbitrum-one:v1: pnpm run codegen:v1 && graph build subgraph-v1.arbitrum-one.yaml
scripts.build:arbitrum-one:v2: pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph build subgraph.arbitrum-one.yaml
scripts.build:arbitrum-sepolia:v1: pnpm run codegen:v1 && graph build subgraph-v1.arbitrum-sepolia.yaml
scripts.build:arbitrum-sepolia:v2: pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph build subgraph.arbitrum-sepolia.yaml
scripts.build:base-mainnet:v1: pnpm run codegen:v1 && graph build subgraph-v1.base-mainnet.yaml
scripts.build:base-mainnet:v2: pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph build subgraph.base-mainnet.yaml
scripts.build:base-sepolia:v1: pnpm run codegen:v1 && graph build subgraph-v1.base-sepolia.yaml
scripts.build:base-sepolia:v2: pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph build subgraph.base-sepolia.yaml
scripts.build:bsc-mainnet:v1: pnpm run codegen:v1 && graph build subgraph-v1.bsc-mainnet.yaml
scripts.build:bsc-mainnet:v2: pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph build subgraph.bsc-mainnet.yaml
scripts.build:bsc-testnet:v1: pnpm run codegen:v1 && graph build subgraph-v1.bsc-testnet.yaml
scripts.build:bsc-testnet:v2: pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph build subgraph.bsc-testnet.yaml
scripts.build:linea-mainnet:v1: pnpm run codegen:v1 && graph build subgraph-v1.linea-mainnet.yaml
scripts.build:linea-mainnet:v2: pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph build subgraph.linea-mainnet.yaml
scripts.build:linea-sepolia:v1: pnpm run codegen:v1 && graph build subgraph-v1.linea-sepolia.yaml
scripts.build:linea-sepolia:v2: pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph build subgraph.linea-sepolia.yaml
scripts.test: cp schema-v2.graphql schema.graphql && cp subgraph.linea-sepolia.yaml subgraph.yaml && pnpm run codegen:v2 && graph test && rm -Rf schema.graphql
